name: derby dee's driving school
description:
this was made  ~ during ~ ludum dare but not submitted 

i made this at babycastles also 

my mom was in town also some other stuff happened so  i only spent a couple hours 

on this and i saw a yugioh gallery during it too, this driving system isnt much but i love 

racing games and driving in games so I wated to make a driving system, it will be part 

of a bigger game that is called Derby Dee's Racing , which is a Big Bag collective game 

stay tuned ! 

-----CONTROLS-----

Enter - Gas Pedal 

A - left, D - right 

S - break, reverse 

hold ; key to drift 

R to restart 

you should watch the live action Speed Racer movie if you get the chance ,
